participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Cheerful and sociable, Emily loves to engage in conversations about food and family.
participant_1.background: i live in alabama. i like tacos. i've one brother. i have three sisters.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Down-to-earth and hardworking, Jake enjoys sharing stories about farm life and music.
participant_2.background: i work my parents farms. i only listen to country music. i drive a big truck and live in country. i have a pet cow. i'm an electrician.
